<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sancov&#95;pcs parallels the other metadata section(s). Optimizers (e.g.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// GlobalOpt/ConstantMerge) may not discard sancov&#95;pcs and the other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// section(s) as a unit, so we conservatively retain all unconditionally in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the compiler.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// With comdat (COFF/ELF), the linker can guarantee the associated sections</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will be retained or discarded as a unit, so llvm.compiler.used is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sufficient. Otherwise, conservatively make all of them retained by the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// linker.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/msgpack/#afdae9da66bac09f4b2bfc0fd9f0559e6a4410ec34d9e6c1a68100ca0ce033fb17">Array</a>-&gt;hasComdat())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"><span class="doxyHighlight">    GlobalsToAppendToCompilerUsed.push&#95;back(Array);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// On every indirect call we call a run-time function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="853"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#95;&#95;sanitizer&#95;cov&#95;indir&#95;call&#42; with two parameters:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   - callee address,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   - global cache array that contains CacheSize pointers (zero-initialized).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     The cache is used to speed up recording the caller-callee pairs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The address of the caller is passed implicitly via caller PC.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CacheSize is encoded in the name of the run-time function.</span></CodeLine>
